page.title: 16PLAISTOW, BUILDINGS
page.content: {The Village Hall} {Winterton Hall was built in 1908 in {memory of Edward, 5th Earl Winterton. His wife and son Edward,Earl Winterton M.P. had the hall built as a memorial for{the use of the residents of {the village. The hall is used by the Playgroup, Sunday School, Women's Institute, Parish Council meetings and private parties. There is a{Youth Wing}built onto the back of the hall. Once a week the hall is used as a {doctor's surgery.}The doctor comes from Dunsfold, three miles away.
